1: -module(simple_cache_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    4: -include_lib("eunit/include/eunit.hrl").
    5: 
    6: -compile(export_all).
    7: 
    8: suite() ->
    9:     [{timetrap,{seconds,30}}].
   10: 
   11: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   12:     application:start(simple_cache),
   13:     Config.
   14: 
   15: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   16:     ok.
   17: 
   18: all() ->
   19:     [insert_case].
   20: 
   21: insert_case(_Config) ->
   22:     simple_cache:insert(foo, bar),
   23:     ?assertMatch({ok, bar}, simple_cache:lookup(foo)),
   24:     ok.
   25: 
   26: lookup_case(_Config) ->
   27:     simple_cache:insert(foo, bar),
   28:     simple_cache:delete(foo),
   29:     ?assertMatch(undefined, simple_cache:lookup(foo)),
   30:     ok.
